subject: How to run setUp() only once for all the Test Cases
msgSnippet: Hi, I want to run/execute the setUp() method only once for all the test cases. How to do that ? FAQs say by writing this code: TestSuite suite = new
messageBody:
Hi,

I want to run/execute the setUp() method only once for all the test cases.
How to do that ?

FAQs say by writing this code:

TestSuite suite = new TestSuite(MoneyAgainTest.class);
TestSetup wrapper = new TestSetup(suite) {
public void setUp() {
oneTimeSetUp();
}
};
return wrapper;

But where is the oneTimeSetUp() class defined ? OR do I have to implement
this class ? If yes, then how do I specify to call setUp() only once ?

Please HELP !!

Thanks & Regards,
Aparna.
